Player History
Injured on 4/22/1964 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Traded from Penn to Boston (UBA) on 7/6/1965 (Going to PEN: LF J. Leeds, 2B G. Dueñas, SS M. Doggett. Going to PIL: RF W. Perras, RF M. Fagenson, C C. Maddux)...
Injured on 7/6/1965 with a Broken Ribs, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/26/1966 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1967, off Robert Holland (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1967, off Scott Barrier (LP)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1968, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1969, hitting .452 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1970, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1970, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1970, hitting .327 with 11 HR, 32 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Coney Island on 4/23/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1971, hitting .467 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 5/8/1971...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Longport, driving in 8 runs on 8/8/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1972, hitting .421 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Troy on 9/30/1972...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1972, hitting .320 with 5 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1972, hitting .298 with 33 HR, 103 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Penn on 4/9/1973...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1973, hitting .337 with 8 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against West Texas on 9/4/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1974, hitting .522 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 8/28/1974...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Troy on 7/26/1976...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Gashouse on 6/9/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1977, hitting .548 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against West Texas on 8/21/1977...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Bay City on 1/31/1979 (Going to PIL: P E. Regalado, 1B J. Dugas. Going to BC: P T. Fierros, RF M. Fagenson)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1979, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/21/1979, off Thomas Tuttle (CBC)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1980, hitting .376 with 10 HR, 25 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Diablo on 4/16/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $640,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1983 to a minor league contract.
